Package main

Class Summary
ActionHandler Class for handling action events of menubar and toolbar buttons.
Commons Class for performing common operations for gui.
DocumentHandler Class for opening demanded document.
Formatter Class for formatting numeric values in GUIs.
ImageHandler Class for returning every kind of image to be displayed.
Main Class having the main method.
MenuBar Class for menu bar of the main frame.
Panels Class for creating panels for the main frame.
PopupMenu1 Class for popup menu for the canvas of the main frame.
PopupMenu2 Class for popup menu for the panels of the main frame.
Progressor Class for showing process information.
SolidMAT Class for main frame.
Statusbar Class for Status bar of main frame.
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
SwingWorker.ThreadVar Class to maintain reference to current worker thread under separate synchronization control.
Toolbars Class for creating toolbars for the main frame.
